attributes.action: Take immediate and clear action with regard to the sentencing of the Teacher in Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After a British teacher was found guilty in Sudan of insulting religion after she allowed her primary school class to name a teddy bear Muhammad and sentanced to a term in jail.

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to demand immediate release and shut the Embassy of the Republic or Sudan in London in order to send a clear message to those countries that have no or little regard to the rights of the british citizen.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
